uk.ac.nottingham.controllers

Class ScenariosController

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.nottingham.controllers.ScenariosController

  • public class ScenariosController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for the Scenarios screen. It also initializes the charts for displaying simulation demo data. Offers several functions to alter those charts. Allows running and resuming the simulation.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        private void initialize()
        Called once on an implementing controller when the contents of its associated document have been completely loaded.

      • initializeCharts

        private void initializeCharts()
        Initializes the charts by setting the properties of the axes, adding the data series and setting up the charts as well. The charts are then added to a GridPane.

      • addValue

        public void addValue(double pipeX,
                     double pipeY,
                     double tankX,
                     double tankY)
        Add the argument values to XYChart.Series, which is then displayed in the Scene.
        Parameters:
        pipeX - x coordinate for pipe
        pipeY - y coordinate for pipe
        tankX - x coordinate for tank
        tankY - y coordinate for tank

      • resizePipeTimeAxis

        public void resizePipeTimeAxis(int upperBound)
        Sets the upper bound of the X NumberAxis for the pipe.
        Parameters:
        upperBound - the upper bound number to set

      • resizeTankTimeAxis

        public void resizeTankTimeAxis(int upperBound)
        Sets the upper bound of the X NumberAxis for the tank.
        Parameters:
        upperBound - the upper bound number to set

      • runButton

        public void runButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Changes the colour and text of the RUN / PAUSE Button on click.
        Parameters:
        event - ActionEvent calling this method

      • changeToScenarioOne

        private void changeToScenarioOne()
        Changes the scenario to be loaded.

      • changeToScenarioTwo

        private void changeToScenarioTwo()
        Change scenario to two

      • setRun

        private void setRun()
        Style the RUN button to pause. Starts running the simulation demo or when it has been paused it just resumes the current demo.

      • setPause

        public void setPause()
        Style the RUN button to run. Stop running the processor thread.

      • setReaders

        private void setReaders()
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Initialize the BufferedReaders that are used in the processor thread. Can be also called to reset them.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when files can't be loaded

      • returnToWelcomeScreen

        private void returnToWelcomeScreen()
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Reloads the Welcome Screen. Called on back button press.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when the fxml file can't be loaded

      • setFinished

        public void setFinished(boolean finished)
        Sets the finished flag.
        Parameters:
        finished - new boolean value to be set
